title: Wealth Whispers, but I'm Screaming Over These Quiet Luxury Cyber Monday Finds from Nordstrom, J.Crew and Ralph Lauren
excerpt: One editor breaks down the best Cyber Monday sales with quiet luxury items from Nordstrom, J.Crew, and Ralph Lauren, including cashmere, sweaters, and more.
text: I have a talent for finding clothing items that look like they belong on the cast of Succession. Pair that with the massive surge of Cyber Monday sales and Black Friday deals I've been seeing across my social media for the last few days and, in true quiet luxury fashion, you don't have to spend thousands of dollars to look like you're in the highest tax bracket. Wealth may be silent but, frankly, I'm screaming over the Cyber Monday deals from my favorite brands like Nordstrom, J.Crew, and Ralph Lauren. Think luxurious cashmere, classic boots, and simple, yet cozy, sweaters and Ralph Lauren pajama sets that billionaires and editors alike will be salivating over the following Cyber week.Below, scroll through all the luxe, quiet luxury Cyber Monday finds I can't stop thinking about.What I'm Buying From the Nordstrom, J.Crew, and Ralph Lauren Cyber Monday salesThese Nordstrom leather booties that look suspiciously similar to the designer pair I was eyeing earlier this month, at a fraction of the price ($80)The Ralph Lauren Dachshund sweater I've been seeing go viral on TikTok over the last couple weeks ($109)The classic cashmere crewneck sweater that's under-$100 for a couple more days ($77)Another viral Ralph Lauren suede handbag I first spotted on the runway during New York Fashion Week ($299)These chic J.Crew pajamas that scream "festive" and "trust fund" in the same sentence ($27)Nordstrom Cyber Monday Sale Finds Caslon Cashmere Crewneck Sweater Run, don't walk, to get this sweater before it sells out. BCBG Max Azria Reversible Wool Blend Barn Jacket I'm into the barn coat trend this season. Nordstrom V-Neck Cashmere Sweater Cashmere for under $100? Say less. Sam Edelman Tie Belt Wool Blend Wrap Coat This is such a classic coat that'll last you for years. Nordstrom Arazio Kitten Heel Bootie J.Crew Cyber Monday Sale Finds J.Crew Cashmere Classic-Fit Crewneck Sweater If this isn't a sign to buy cashmere while it's deeply discounted this Cyber Monday, I'm not sure what is. J.Crew Tissue Crepe Turtleneck I gasped when I saw how well-priced this turtleneck is. J.Crew Pajama Pant in Black Watch Cotton Flannel I'm definitely buying these for my whole friend group at this low price. J.Crew Brushed Cashmere Beanie J.Crew New Stevie Ankle Boots in Leather J.Crew Cashmere Tech-Touch Gloves The underrated luxe accessory you'll see on every New Yorker's hands in the coming weeks. J.Crew Brushed Cashmere Relaxed Crewneck Sweater Ralph Lauren Cyber Monday Sale Finds Ralph Lauren Cable-Knit Cotton Crewneck Sweater This is such a classic (and a steal... have you seen that price?!) Ralph Lauren Double-Breasted Wool-Blend Blazer Just the perfect amount of slouch in this blazer. Ralph Lauren Cable-Knit Wool-Cashmere Sweater If you buy one thing from this list, let it be this. Ralph Lauren Polo ID Suede Mini Shoulder Bag A designer bag for under $300? Don't mind if I do. Ralph Lauren Brooke Burnished Leather Riding Boot These are quintessentially Ralph Lauren. Ralph Lauren Suede Ball Cap I'll leave you with this cool girl-approved accessory. Ana Escalante is an award-winning journalist and Gen Z editor whose work ranges from dissecting size inclusivity at fashion week to discussing how American Girl Doll meme accounts are the the answer to society's collective spiral. She's covered it all: Queen Elizabeth II's corgis, Roe v. Wade frontline protests, and the emergence of jorts (or jean shorts for the uninitated). At Who What Wear, Ana is responsible for delivering smart, insightful, personality-driven shopping guides and trend features for a digital-first generation.Before joining Who What Wear, Ana was Glamour magazine's editorial assistant, where she focused on daily news and special packages, including leading the brand's 2022 Met Gala coverage. For more than half a decade, she has covered style, beauty, and digital culture for publications such as Paper magazine, Harper's Bazaar, Vogue Japan, and Allure, among others. Ana has been called a rising star in media by publications such as Nylon and Teen Vogue. (Her mother, meanwhile, calls her "the coolest person" she knows.)
html:
I have a talent for finding clothing items that look like they belong on the cast of Succession. Pair that with the massive surge of Cyber Monday sales and Black Friday deals I've been seeing across my social media for the last few days and, in true quiet luxury fashion, you don't have to spend thousands of dollars to look like you're in the highest tax bracket. Wealth may be silent but, frankly, I'm screaming over the Cyber Monday deals from my favorite brands like Nordstrom, J.Crew, and Ralph Lauren. Think luxurious cashmere, classic boots, and simple, yet cozy, sweaters and Ralph Lauren pajama sets that billionaires and editors alike will be salivating over the following Cyber week.

Below, scroll through all the luxe, quiet luxury Cyber Monday finds I can't stop thinking about.

What I'm Buying From the Nordstrom, J.Crew, and Ralph Lauren Cyber Monday sales

  • These Nordstrom leather booties that look suspiciously similar to the designer pair I was eyeing earlier this month, at a fraction of the price ($80)
  • The Ralph Lauren Dachshund sweater I've been seeing go viral on TikTok over the last couple weeks ($109)
  • The classic cashmere crewneck sweater that's under-$100 for a couple more days ($77)
  • Another viral Ralph Lauren suede handbag I first spotted on the runway during New York Fashion Week ($299)
  • These chic J.Crew pajamas that scream "festive" and "trust fund" in the same sentence ($27)

Nordstrom Cyber Monday Sale Finds

Caslon

Cashmere Crewneck Sweater

Run, don't walk, to get this sweater before it sells out.

BCBG Max Azria

Reversible Wool Blend Barn Jacket

I'm into the barn coat trend this season.

Nordstrom

V-Neck Cashmere Sweater

Cashmere for under $100? Say less.

Sam Edelman

Tie Belt Wool Blend Wrap Coat

This is such a classic coat that'll last you for years.

Nordstrom

Arazio Kitten Heel Bootie

J.Crew Cyber Monday Sale Finds

J.Crew

Cashmere Classic-Fit Crewneck Sweater

If this isn't a sign to buy cashmere while it's deeply discounted this Cyber Monday, I'm not sure what is.

J.Crew

Tissue Crepe Turtleneck

I gasped when I saw how well-priced this turtleneck is.

J.Crew

Pajama Pant in Black Watch Cotton Flannel

I'm definitely buying these for my whole friend group at this low price.

J.Crew

Brushed Cashmere Beanie

J.Crew

New Stevie Ankle Boots in Leather

J.Crew

Cashmere Tech-Touch Gloves

The underrated luxe accessory you'll see on every New Yorker's hands in the coming weeks.

J.Crew

Brushed Cashmere Relaxed Crewneck Sweater

Ralph Lauren Cyber Monday Sale Finds

Ralph Lauren

Cable-Knit Cotton Crewneck Sweater

This is such a classic (and a steal... have you seen that price?!)

Ralph Lauren

Double-Breasted Wool-Blend Blazer

Just the perfect amount of slouch in this blazer.

Ralph Lauren

Cable-Knit Wool-Cashmere Sweater

If you buy one thing from this list, let it be this.

Ralph Lauren

Polo ID Suede Mini Shoulder Bag

A designer bag for under $300? Don't mind if I do.

Ralph Lauren

Brooke Burnished Leather Riding Boot

These are quintessentially Ralph Lauren.

Ralph Lauren

Suede Ball Cap

I'll leave you with this cool girl-approved accessory.

Ana Escalante is an award-winning journalist and Gen Z editor whose work ranges from dissecting size inclusivity at fashion week to discussing how American Girl Doll meme accounts are the the answer to society's collective spiral. She's covered it all: Queen Elizabeth II's corgis, Roe v. Wade frontline protests, and the emergence of jorts (or jean shorts for the uninitated). At Who What Wear, Ana is responsible for delivering smart, insightful, personality-driven shopping guides and trend features for a digital-first generation.Before joining Who What Wear, Ana was Glamour magazine's editorial assistant, where she focused on daily news and special packages, including leading the brand's 2022 Met Gala coverage. For more than half a decade, she has covered style, beauty, and digital culture for publications such as Paper magazine, Harper's Bazaar, Vogue Japan, and Allure, among others. Ana has been called a rising star in media by publications such as Nylon and Teen Vogue. (Her mother, meanwhile, calls her "the coolest person" she knows.)
